name: Chan Burauza
body:
### About
Chan Burauza is an Android app for browsing 4chan, designed to be fast and user friendly.

### Donate
Donations are not necessary but appreciated.

[PayPal](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=AYWHNGRZ9UJN2&lc=US&item_name=Chan%20Burauza&currency_code=USD&bn=PP%2dDonationsBF%3abtn_donateCC_LG%2egif%3aNonHosted)

[Google Wallet](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.apps.gmoney&hl=en)

### Open source availability
Soon.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
